summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5427 for the improvement of 43rd Avenue West, from West Barrett Street to a connection with the existing sewer approximately 60 feet south of the south line of Block 6, Carleton Park Heights Addition; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 67932 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
